traits.description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. this pawn can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
traits.name: nudist

traits.description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. this pawn is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.
traits.name: bloodlust

traits.description: Timmy is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person. this pawn never insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around them. this pawn also never judges people by their appearance. their agreeableness also makes them more likely to conform to prevailing opinions.
traits.name: kind

traits.description: Timmy has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother them at all. this pawn doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects them. this pawn also feels no mood boost from socializing.
traits.name: psychopath

traits.description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, this pawn tried it... and this pawn liked it.
traits.name: cannibal

traits.description: Timmy always says exactly what's on their mind, especially if it's bugging them. That tends to rub people the wrong way. At least this pawn doesn't mind being insulted or slighted either.
traits.name: abrasive

traits.description: Timmy is too smart for their own good. this pawn learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
traits.name: toosmart

traits.description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. their accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but this pawn'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: brawler

traits.description: For Timmy, there's something exciting about getting hurt. this pawn doesn't know why, this pawn's just wired differently.
traits.name: masochist

traits.description:
Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

this pawn gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

this pawn doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
traits.name: nightowl

traits.description: Timmy needs a really impressive bedroom. this pawn gets a mood loss if this pawn doesn't get what this pawn wants.
traits.name: greedy

traits.description: For Timmy, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. this pawn gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom. At least this pawn isn't as affected by prisoners or colonists dying and this pawn doesn't mind wearing a dead person's clothing.
traits.name: jealous

traits.description: Timmy has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. this pawn will become unhappy if this pawn has a bedroom that's too impressive. this pawn also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. this pawn never judges others by their appearance.
traits.name: ascetic

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of their own gender.
traits.name: gay

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to both men and women.
traits.name: bisexual

traits.description: Timmy has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.
traits.name: asexual

traits.description: Timmy's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and this pawn tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike them.
traits.name: annoyingvoice

traits.description: Timmy breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
traits.name: creepybreathing

traits.description: Timmy loves to start and watch fires. this pawn get stressed and anxious if not allowed to do so for an extended period of time, but will be happier if allowed to do so. this pawn also enjoys using incendiary weapons and will only go on fire-starting sprees when having a mental break.
traits.name: pyromaniac

traits.description: Timmy is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize them. At least this pawn is really good at running and for whatever reason seems to be nearly immune to toxic substances.
traits.name: wimp

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. this pawn seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: nimble

traits.description: Timmy has a knack for learning. this pawn picks things up much faster than others.
traits.name: fastlearner

traits.description:
Timmy has never learned how to learn. The motivation and talent is there, this pawn just needs time and patience. 

    Each skill point increases global learning factor by 2%
traits.name: slowlearner

traits.description: Timmy has no need to experience the outdoors or light. this pawn will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long this pawn stays inside, and is not bothered by darkness.
traits.name: undergrounder

traits.description: Timmy feels limited in their feeble human body. this pawn often dreams of being enhanced by artificial body parts.
traits.name: bodymodder

traits.description: Timmy believes the human body is limited for a reason. To them, artificial body parts are unethical and disgusting.
traits.name: bodypurist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts men.
traits.name: misandrist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts women.
traits.name: misogynist

traits.description: Timmy has a fantastic memory for detail. this pawn will learn new skills slightly faster than other people.
traits.name: greatmemory

traits.description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. this pawn takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. this pawn stands solid like a rock, and equally unmovable.
traits.name: tough

traits.description: Timmy feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. this pawn will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.
traits.name: torturedartist

traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around food. this pawn gets hungry quickly but also eats faster, cooks faster and knows his ingredients, barely ever causing food poisoning.
traits.name: gourmand

traits.description: Timmy doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether this pawn's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, this pawn will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
traits.name: quicksleeper

traits.description: Timmy is always falling behind the group whenever this pawn goes anywhere.
traits.name: slowpoke

traits.description: Timmy likes to be where this pawn's going. this pawn walks quicker than most people.
traits.name: fastwalker

traits.description: Timmy always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
traits.name: jogger

traits.description: Timmy has an intense fascination with chemical sources of enjoyment. this pawn will consume much more of them and, if not already addicted to any drug and satisfied, will sometimes go on hard drug binges. this pawn will ignore directives to not use pleasurable drugs. If there is one upside to this it's all the inspiration one can get from drugs.
traits.name: chemicalfascination

traits.description: Timmy has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. this pawn will consume more of them and, if not already addicted to any drug and satisfied, will sometimes go on social drug binges. this pawn will ignore directives to not use pleasurable drugs. If there is one upside to this it's all the inspiration one can get from drugs.
traits.name: chemicalinterest

traits.description: Timmy abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals, and avoids alcohol and pleasurable drugs. this pawn is a hard working individual.
stats: Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.

traits.name: teetotaler

traits.description: Timmy is just naturally upbeat about their situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
traits.name: sanguine

traits.description: Timmy is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get them down.
traits.name: optimist

traits.description: Timmy tends to look on the bad side of life.
traits.name: pessimist

traits.description: Timmy is perenially unhappy. this pawn has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine. their only way to deal with it is hiding in their room or wandering around in sadness.
traits.name: depressive

traits.description: Timmy's will is an iron shield. this pawn keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
traits.name: iron-willed

traits.description: Timmy is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
traits.name: steadfast

traits.description: Timmy tends to crack under pressure.
traits.name: nervous

traits.description: Timmy is on a hair-trigger all the time. this pawn is the first to break in any tough situation. If that happens this pawn will find something to smash.
traits.name: volatile

traits.description: Timmy likes to have things squared away. this pawn will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but their random mood swings can get the better of them.
traits.name: neurotic

traits.description: Timmy feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. this pawn will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but their random mood swings can easily get the better of them.
traits.name: veryneurotic

traits.description: Timmy has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
traits.name: industrious

traits.description: Timmy is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
traits.name: hardworker

traits.description: Timmy is a little bit lazy.
traits.name: lazy

traits.description: Timmy loves idleness and hates anything productive. this pawn moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
traits.name: slothful

traits.description: Timmy's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. this pawn is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallyhypersensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallysensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is psychically out of tune with others. this pawn isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydull

traits.description: Timmy's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. this pawn just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydeaf

traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. this pawn shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
traits.name: carefulshooter

traits.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! Timmy just likes pulling the trigger. this pawn shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
traits.name: trigger-happy

traits.description: Timmy has had proper training with ranged weapons. this pawn shoots accurately and quickly.
traits.name: expertshooter

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to them before this pawn even opens their mouth.
traits.name: beautiful

traits.description: Timmy has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like them.
traits.name: pretty

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions. If there is an upside to this than that no one minds if their face has a scar or two.
traits.name: ugly

traits.description: Timmy is staggeringly ugly. their face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at them while conversing. If there is an upside to this than that no one minds if their face has a scar or two... or ten.
traits.name: staggeringlyugly

traits.description: Timmy has a naturally powerful immune system. this pawn will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
traits.name: super-immune

traits.description: Timmy has an awful immune system. this pawn gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
traits.name: sickly

traits.description: Timmy always shies away from danger. this pawn is usually the first to flee from battle.
traits.name: cowardly

traits.description: Few things scare Timmy. In battle this pawn stands unfazed where others panic and flee.
traits.name: brave

traits.description: Timmy laughs in the face of danger. Some ascribe it to bravery, others to stupidity. Either way, Timmy seems to lack any sense of self-preservation and will never flee from a threatening situation.
traits.name: fearless

traits.description: Timmy hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.
traits.name: xenophobe

traits.description: Timmy thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.
traits.name: xenophile

traits.description: Timmy identifies strongly as a male. Physical traits related to the Male gender give mood boosts, while traits conflicting with it will give negative mood.
traits.name: transmale

traits.description: Timmy identifies strongly as a female. Physical traits related to the Female gender give mood boosts, while traits conflicting with it will give negative mood.
traits.name: transfemale

traits.description: Timmy does not want to be identified as any gender. The closer to truly androgynous they are, the happier they are.
traits.name: trans:androgyne

traits.description: Timmy is content with their body, regardless of their identified gender. They will experience no form of dysphoria.
traits.name: body-content

traits.description: Timmy is much more affected by dysphoria than normal.
traits.name: body-sensitive

traits.description: Timmy is able to tear apart the fabrics of reality, moving living beings through space at the speed of light.
traits.name: teleporter

traits.description: Timmy is able to hide himself from prying eyes, literally leaving under the noses of enemies.
traits.name: inquisitor

traits.description: Timmy has an explosive character and is great at concentrating this power.
traits.name: phoenix

traits.description: Timmy has the ability to manipulate water and its forms.
traits.name: aquarior

traits.description: Timmy can manipulate the ground under his feet, making it serve.
traits.name: terrarior

traits.description: Timmy subdues the air around him, setting it in motion.
traits.name: aeron

traits.description: Timmy able to control electromagnetic waves.
traits.name: magnetic

traits.description: Timmy is able to manipulate people and absorb their emotions.
traits.name: mentalist

traits.description: Timmy has the ability to help peoples.
traits.name: paladin

traits.description: Timmy is uncommonly agile and stealthy, with better reflexes and a more flexible body than most.
traits.name: stealthy

traits.description:
Timmy has a special connection to animals and understands them better than most people. Animals also tend to understand what this pawn wants from them. The time this pawn spends with animals is long, but worth it.

    Taming never causes manhunter
    Easier taming of very wild animals
traits.name: animalfriend

traits.description:
Timmy is proficient with various construction materials, particularly stone. this pawn will construct anything out of stone three times as fast as others and smooth out your rocky base in no time.

    Stone construction speed +200%
traits.name: architect

traits.description:
Timmy has a unique approach to science. this pawn always thinks outside the box and finds inspiration for intellectual problems in art.

    Artistic increases research speed
traits.name: creativethinker

traits.description: Timmy seems to have rented all the good fortune on this Rimworld.
traits.name: fortunate

traits.description:
Timmy has a special talent to grow plants and nurture them even in hostile enviroments. this pawn can grow any plant, even if other people would fail due to their lack of skills. this pawn would like some plants in their bedroom.

    Can grow any plant regardless of skill
traits.name: greenthumb

traits.description: Timmy is a gun nut, their life revolves around guns, how they are crafted, maintained and used. Quite a handy skill in these circumstances. Just don't hand them a melee weapon.
traits.name: gunnut

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally coordinated with his hands.
traits.name: hand-eyecoordination

traits.description: Timmy has a keen eye and can spot even tiny mineral deposits. this pawn will occassionally find small clumps of resources when mining any sort of stone or ore. Chance increased for flatter terrain.
traits.name: keeneye

traits.description:
Timmy has had their fair share of encounters with mechanoids. this pawn has become an expert in mechanoid construction and combat, making them uniquely suited to disassemble and fight them.

    Damage versus mechanoids +50%
traits.name: mechanoidexpert

traits.description:
Timmy wants thing to be exactly right. This does take time, but the results speak for themselves.

    Quality level +1 (50% chance)
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description: Timmy knows exactly the right words for every situation. This also means their insults hurt more.
traits.name: silvertongue

traits.description:
Timmy has particularly steady hands, which don't even tremble in dire circumstances or when this pawn themself is injured.

    No self-tend penalty
traits.name: steadyhands

traits.description: Timmy has a very strong back or is part mule or something. this pawn can carry significantly more as a normal person.
traits.name: strongback

traits.description: Timmy tends to occasionally allow their mind to drift, even in the middle of working.
traits.name: absent-minded

traits.description: Timmy has a loose screw or two, a small trade off for being naturally scientifically inclined.
traits.name: eccentric

traits.description: Timmy strives for perfection in their work. They will naturally produce better quality products at the expense of time. However, making a low quality product will upset them. Additionally, they may very rarely quit a project mid attempt if they don't like the direction its going in.
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description: While fully capable of warfare in theory, Timmy's fight or flight instincts heavily lean towards flight, and this pawn will try to hide or run as a first priority.
traits.name: coward

traits.description: Timmy has a higher mental and physical fortitude compared to most and can more readily adapt to harsh environments in the rimworlds.
traits.name: brave

traits.description: Minor bruises and scrapes plague Timmy all too often, mostly due to uncoordinated tripping or falling.
traits.name: clumsy

traits.description: Timmy loves the brightness and heat of a dry summer day. They don't mind working up a sweat or sleeping in the warmth either.
traits.name: heatinclined

traits.description: Timmy loves the overcast and cold of a brisk winter night. They don't mind getting chilly or sleeping in the cold either.
traits.name: coldinclined

traits.description: A bomb could go off next to Timmy while they sleep and they'd continue to do so. They can't be bothered to defend the colony mid catnap, either.
traits.name: heavysleeper

traits.description: Timmy is naturally hygenic and organized. They will not track in dirt or throw trash anywhere, and feel happy while cleaning.
traits.name: neat

traits.description: Timmy is sloppy naturally and leaves trash and dirt everywhere it seems. At least they're not much bothered by messes.
traits.name: slob

traits.description: Timmy has problems taking breaks or resting mid job. this pawn will continue to work even sacrificing their health or sleep.
traits.name: workaholic

traits.description: Timmy has never felt nausea in their life. Throwing up or food poisoning is foreign to them.
traits.name: ironstomach

traits.description: Timmy can't stand mistreatment of animals. this pawn will feel happier being nuzzled or being a master to a bonded animal, but will be more deeply crushed when not master of a bonded animal or seeing one die. They also refuse to butcher.
traits.name: animallover

traits.description: Timmy believes deeply in human superiority. Killing animals will please them and the colony losing an animal is a cherry on top according to them.
traits.name: animalhater

traits.description: Whether because they're a bit chunky or because they shift their weight oddly, Timmy has broken a few chairs in their time and is likely to break more.
traits.name: big-boned

traits.description: Timmy only plays by their own rules, and will roll their eyes and take it easy while doing any task they've been forced to do.
traits.name: rebel

traits.description: Timmy needs clear instructions on how, and when to do certain things and will only work at a normal speed when being forced to do something.
traits.name: submissive

traits.description: Timmy is fueled by spite. They can't stand walking on the same soil as their rivals and will be elated by news of their life ending.
traits.name: vengeful

traits.description: Whether by past trauma or fear of change, Timmy rejects modernity. They may randomly punch or attack mechanical devices and refuse to learn or research anything about them. They also love killing mechanoids.
traits.name: technophobe

traits.description: Timmy always recalls the good times and lives to party, any party attended will be remembered for many times longer than most.
traits.name: fun-loving

traits.description: Timmy has hindered mental capacities. While slow to learn and hard to speak with, they tend to be much happier naturally.
traits.name: dunce

traits.description: Timmy learned a specific move in melee combat which allows them to disarm opponents and will use it frequently.
traits.name: martialartist

traits.description: Timmy believes they belong in high society, and loves nothing more than critiquing art and brushing elbows with royalty.
traits.name: snob

traits.description: Sour stomach plagues Timmy any time they're around too much blood or rotting corpses. Vomiting is just part of life for them.
traits.name: squeamish

traits.description: Timmy feels naturally anxious, but especially from social situations. They will not attend any gatherings and may occasionally need alone time in their room to breathe.
traits.name: anxious

traits.description: No amount of lovin' is enough lovin' for Timmy. this pawn will tend to jump from partner to partner and tumble between the sheets with them frequently.
traits.name: insatiable

traits.description: Timmy refuses to give their body to anybody but their spouse and would never fathom initiating a divorce. They also hate being nude much more than other pawns.
traits.name: prude

traits.description: An armchair and flatscreen is all Timmy needs to be happy. Even reruns or ancient commercials are entertaining to them, they will never grow bored of television and tend to watch it more, as well as feel pleased after doing so.
traits.name: couchpotato

traits.description: Timmy is mad for all things feline. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with cats, however they're not a fan of dogs.
traits.name: catperson

traits.description: Timmy is mad for all things canine. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with dogs, however they're not a fan of cats.
traits.name: dogperson

traits.description: Timmy is a natural scientist. They research much faster and recall things better. However, they'll be upset without a laboratory dedicated to their work and tend to stress out more frequently.
traits.name: prodigy

traits.description: Timmy believes animals are integral to the way society and life functions from furry friends to sources of food. They love having as many as possible and are particularly good at taming and training them.
traits.name: menagerist

traits.description: The sea calls to Timmy. this pawn feels happier just being near the ocean or a deep river.
traits.name: oceanlover

traits.description: The mountains call to Timmy. this pawn feels happier just being near a large mountain.
traits.name: mountainlover

traits.description: Timmy has a twisted secret. this pawn treats organ harvesting like a sick experiment, and does not even blink at the idea. While harvesting one will make them happy, going too long without giving in to their compulsion will upset them.
traits.name: madsurgeon

traits.description: Timmy is supposedly a hand-to-hand combat specialist, but only when inebriated. They claim to become more talented the more drunk they are.
traits.name: drunkenmaster

traits.description: Timmy is compulsed to steal and take things that don't belong to them, even if it means angering the other party.
traits.name: kleptomaniac

traits.description: Smokeleaf culture is just part of life for Timmy. this pawn absolutely adores smokeleaf and would rather die before giving it up.
traits.name: stoner

traits.description: Alcohol culture is just part of life for Timmy. this pawn absolutely adores booze and would rather die before giving it up.
traits.name: lush

traits.description: Timmy loves to travel and does so swiftly, but can grow upset if they haven't done so in a while. They are also quite adept at foraging while traveling.
traits.name: wanderlust

traits.description: Timmy is never really asleep or awake. this pawn is almost zombie like, lurching along and working very slowly, and will only sleep once every three days or so.
traits.name: insomniac

traits.description: Timmy has grown tired of the world and needs to be constantly distracted to stop dark thoughts. their bleak personality is a big downer and therefore it is very hard to become friends with them.
traits.name: worldweary

traits.description: Timmy is hardened through what can only be presumed as old emotional trauma. They feel absolutely nothing from lost animals, colonists, family, prisoners or dead bodies.
traits.name: desensitized

traits.description: Only the finest of culinary creations may grace the lips of Timmy. They feel neutral towards mundane meals, but will laud and savour lavish meals down to the last bite.
traits.name: refinedpalate

traits.description: Whether through studying ancient manuscripts or years of scholastic pursuit Timmy is surprisingly well read on a variety of topics, particularly science and medical practice.
traits.name: academian

traits.description: Timmy strongly believes infrastucture rules all and is a natural born stoneworker.
traits.name: groundbreaker

traits.description: In the eyes of Timmy food is art, their culinary creations are incredibly beautiful, amazing to taste, and almost always safe to eat.
traits.name: gastronomist

traits.description: Flora and fauna are both vital to Timmy. They use all parts of plants and animals and strongly appreciate mother Gaia's blessings.
traits.name: ecologist

traits.description: Timmy has an eye for silver and a tongue made from it. They believe their products are the best products and this pawn will likely convince you if given the chance.
traits.name: tycoon

traits.description: Timmy is strangely hypercoagulating and will bleed much more slowly than most.
traits.name: thickskinned

traits.description: Timmy is strangely hemophilic and tends to bleed much more profusely than others.
traits.name: thinskinned

traits.description: Timmy has trouble expressing themselves until its all too much to bear, whereafter they will have an utter meltdown.
traits.name: schizoid

traits.description: Timmy's mind is awaken to the psychic maelstrom.
traits.name: psionic

traits.description: Timmy has a lot of creative power. this pawn is very good at making unique works of art, as well as discovering new ways of solving problems.
traits.name: creative(outdated)

traits.description: Timmy can't die.
traits.name: immortal

traits.description: Timmy has seen a lot of death and pain. this pawn's not a true psycopath and can enjoy socialization, but this pawn's also not affected by the suffering of others.
traits.name: indifferent

traits.description: Timmy prefers to stay alone - and is very good at that.
traits.name: lonewolf

traits.description: Timmy is a crackshot with a gun - or any ranged weapon for that matter.
traits.name: gunslinger

traits.description: Timmy is skilled at fighting in close-quarters.
traits.name: duelist

traits.description: Timmy is very brave and quite hard to kill.
traits.name: meatshield

traits.description: Timmy has a heavy hand to deliver pain to the enemies.
traits.name: fighter

traits.description: Timmy is very good at building structures, furniture and machinery.
traits.name: mason

traits.description: Timmy is really good at working with animals.
traits.name: shepherd

traits.description: Timmy is good at hunting the big game, and can also train animals for various tasks.
traits.name: hunter

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled crafter, and can work both fast and skillfully.
traits.name: crafter

traits.description: Timmy has a deep understanding of art and beauty.
traits.name: artisan

traits.description: Timmy is good at taking care of wounds and diseases.
traits.name: nurse

traits.description: Timmy has a deep understanding of the body and can perform surgeries with higher accuracy and speed.
traits.name: surgeon

traits.description: Timmy is a great cook and can make really delicious dishes.
traits.name: chef

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled miner, and knows how to work with minerals.
traits.name: miner

traits.description: Timmy is very charismatic and can bend other people to their will.
traits.name: diplomat

traits.description: Timmy is quite smart, and can research faster as well as working with medical chemistry.
traits.name: scientist

traits.description: Timmy is very intelligent and can research really fast.
traits.name: researcher

traits.description: Timmy is good at working with plants, cutting down trees and harvesting crops.
traits.name: herbalist

traits.description: Timmy has a strong back, and can move fast even while carrying weight.
traits.name: hauler

traits.description: Timmy has a strong back which allows them to carry more than most people.
traits.name: strongback

traits.description: Timmy has a very strong back, this pawn must be part mule or something because this pawn can carry a lot more than most people.
traits.name: verystrongback

traits.description: Timmy has a charismatic personality. this pawn is good at social interactions and trading.
traits.name: charismatic

traits.description: Timmy has a very charismatic personality. this pawn is great at social interactions and trading.
traits.name: verycharismatic

traits.description: Timmy has an intimidating personality, this gives them an advantage in social interactions.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: intimidating

traits.description: Timmy has a very intimidating personality, this gives them a large advantage in social interactions.
stats: +20% per day slave suppression fall rate
+20% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: veryintimidating

traits.description: Timmy has poor hand-eye coordination and will miss their target more often in combat.
traits.name: pooraim

traits.description: Timmy has good hand-eye coordination and will miss their target less often in combat.
traits.name: steadyaim

traits.description: Timmy has great hand-eye coordination and will miss their target less often in combat.
traits.name: greataim

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled crafter with artistic finesse, this pawn enjoys putting things together and this pawn's pretty good at it.
traits.name: artisan

traits.description: Timmy has an iron stomach. this pawn can go without eating longer and it takes more to upset their stomach.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: ironstomach

traits.description: Timmy packs lightly. this pawn will carry less but will move more swiftly.
traits.name: packin'light

traits.description: Timmy is a pack rat, this pawn will keep just about anything that might be useful later.
traits.name: packrat

traits.description: Timmy has good reflexes and moves with finesse. this pawn will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
traits.name: agile

traits.description: Timmy has great reflexes and moves like a ninja. this pawn will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
traits.name: ninja

traits.description: Timmy is more intelligent than average. this pawn learns faster and has a good understanding of the world around them.
traits.name: intelligent

traits.description: Timmy is very intelligent. this pawn learns faster and has a great understanding of the world around them.
traits.name: veryintelligent

traits.description: Timmy is aware of their surroundings and has a good understanding of how their actions affects others.
traits.name: perceptive

traits.description: Timmy is very aware of their surroundings and has a great understanding of how their actions affects others.
traits.name: veryperceptive

traits.description: Timmy is good at doging things. this pawn is good at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.
traits.name: dodgy

traits.description: Timmy is great at evading things. this pawn is great at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.
traits.name: evasive

traits.description: Timmy is great at traveling. this pawn moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
traits.name: traveler

traits.description: Timmy is great at exploration. this pawn moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
traits.name: explorer

traits.description: Timmy is great at adventuring. this pawn moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
traits.name: adventurer

traits.description: Timmy is a bandolier. this pawn likes to keep extra ammo handy for reloading ranged weapons.
traits.name: bandolier

traits.description: Timmy has a scientific mind. this pawn is a good researcher and a fast learner.
traits.name: scientific

traits.description: Timmy has a very scientific mind. this pawn is a great researcher and a fast learner.
traits.name: veryscientific

traits.description: Timmy has good health and an enduring personality. this pawn is better at handling stressful situations than others.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: enduring

traits.description: Timmy has exceptional health and a very enduring personality. this pawn is capable of handling high stress situations that others cannot.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: veryenduring

traits.description: Timmy is great at bargaining. this pawn is great at social interactions and can find great deals while trading.
traits.name: bargainer

traits.description: Timmy is a hard bargainer. this pawn is adept at social interactions and can find the best deals while trading.
traits.name: hardbargainer

traits.description: Timmy has an uninspiring personality. this pawn has less motivation to learn and puts less effort into social interactions.
stats: -10% per day slave suppression fall rate
-10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: uninspiring

traits.description: Timmy has an inspirational personality. this pawn is good at social interactions and is a motivated learner .
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: inspirational

traits.description: Timmy has a very inspirational personality. this pawn is great at social interactions and is a very motivated learner.
stats: +20% per day slave suppression fall rate
+20% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: veryinspirational

traits.description: Timmy is a generous person, sometimes to a fault. this pawn is a good negotiator but often does so by offering more than this pawn should.
traits.name: generous

traits.description: Timmy is an overly generous person to a fault. this pawn is a great negotiator but often does so by offering more than this pawn should
traits.name: overlygenerous

traits.description: Timmy is good at working with scrap metal. this pawn is great with a smelter and is efficient when using building materials.
traits.name: scrapper

traits.description: Timmy is a natural leader, this pawn is good at social interactions and can handle stressful situations that others might not.
stats: +20% per day slave suppression fall rate
+20% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: naturalleader

traits.description: Timmy's body has built up a resistance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
traits.name: radresistant

traits.description: Timmy's body has built up a tolerance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
traits.name: radtolerant

traits.description: There's no time to waste! Timmy has increased movement and work speed.
traits.name: actionboy

traits.description: There's no time to waste! Timmy has increased movement and work speed.
traits.name: actiongirl

traits.description: Timmy has quick hands. When it comes to their hands, Timmy never hesitates.
traits.name: quickhands

traits.description: Timmy is a gun nut, this pawn loves guns so much that this pawn gets a mood boost while holding a ranged weapon.
traits.name: gunnut

traits.description: Timmy knows how to scavenge and gather for resources quickly, but if you think that's fast wait until you see this pawn eat!
traits.name: scrounger

traits.description: Timmy has a sturdy frame. this pawn can carry more and it takes more to bring them down.
traits.name: sturdyframe

traits.description: Timmy is survialist. this pawn has a natural ability to survive some situations that others might not.
traits.name: survivalist

traits.description: Timmy finds the gap to make the tackle! this pawn moves quickly and gets the jobs done before anyone can react.
traits.name: blitz

traits.description: Timmy is a philanthropist. this pawn is generally good natured and cares for the welfare of others.
traits.name: philanthropist

traits.description: Timmy has healing hands. Whether it's for patching up or food the colony knows they can count on their healing touch.
traits.name: healinghands

traits.description: Timmy is part tree! It takes more to bring Timmy down but also more to get them moving.
stats: +20% per day slave suppression fall rate
+20% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: rooted

traits.description: Timmy has a lead belly. their belly can go much longer without food and this pawn is more resistant to toxic radiation.
traits.name: leadbelly

traits.description: Timmy has bear arms. this pawn can carry more and their arms pack more of a punch!
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: beararms

traits.description: Timmy is serendipitous, this pawn seems to be a pretty lucky individual and this pawn's pretty happy about it too.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: serendipitous

traits.description: Timmy has a passion for gardening. this pawn is quick when working with plants and recieves more bountiful yields when harvesting them.
traits.name: greenthumb

traits.description: Timmy is a tenderizer! this pawn has a passion for beating meat into submission.
traits.name: tenderizer

traits.description: Timmy seems to discover hidden wealth where ever this pawn goes.
traits.name: fortunefinder

traits.description: Timmy is a bountiful butcher! this pawn isn't afraid to dig a little deeper to get what this pawn wants.
traits.name: bountifulbutcher

traits.description: Timmy has a passion for animals. this pawn is adept at animal interactions and will bond with them more often. Timmy refuses to hunt animals.
traits.name: animalfriend

traits.description: Timmy has a magnetic body, literally! Somehow this pawn able to use their attractiveness on not just colonists, but metals too!.
traits.name: magnetic

traits.description: Timmy embodies wellness! Colonist who need treatment can rest easily knowing they have their's expertise keeping them alive.
traits.name: lifegiver

traits.description: Timmy is a spiritual healer, this pawn is a great doctor with good social skills. Timmy loves to grow and make their own medicine.
traits.name: spiritualhealer

traits.description: Timmy has a frail back and won't be able to carry as much as the average person.
traits.name: frailback

traits.description: Timmy is still human, mostly. this pawn is immune to the effects of toxic fallout and much harder to kill but their ghoulish appearance makes interacting with others difficult.
traits.name: ghoulish

traits.description: Timmy isn't stupid! this pawn is just... different. this pawn works through tasks slowly but learns extremely quickly. this pawn is incapable performing intellectual, social or caring tasks.
traits.name: idiotsavant

traits.description: Timmy isn't very smart. this pawn can mess up doing just about anything.
traits.name: stupid

traits.description: Timmy isn't very aware of their surroundings, or anything at all really. this pawn
traits.name: oblivious

traits.description: Timmy is part woodchuck! this pawn wants everyone to think their great woodworking skills are because of talent but everybody knows it's really because of those dang teeth.
traits.name: woodchucker

traits.description: Timmy is a wrecking ball! this pawn can push through building material like it's not even there. this pawn really doesn't know their own strength, often breaking things during construction.
traits.name: wreckingball

traits.description: Timmy is a perfectionist with a passion for art. this pawn is great at construction but takes longer to complete tasks because this pawn puts too much effort into making everything perfect.
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description: Timmy has an iron fist! this pawn can punch through foes like they are not even there. Timmy has a passion for melee combat and dislikes ranged weapons.
traits.name: ironfist

traits.description: Timmy finds it difficult to focus on distant targets, and prefer to get up close and personal.
traits.name: nearsighted

traits.description: Timmy could spot a target from nearly a hundred meters, yet still somehow walk into walls.
traits.name: farsighted

traits.description: Timmy's movements are smooth and graceful.
traits.name: athletic

traits.description: Timmy is so rigid, it's almost like this pawn is souless.
traits.name: stiff

traits.description: Timmy takes care of their personal hygiene.
traits.name: goodhygiene

traits.description: Timmy doesn't care about their hygiene, and sometimes get sick from bad food.
traits.name: poorhygiene

traits.description: Timmy often gets their way with things.
traits.name: persuasive

traits.description: Timmy has never won a debate in their life.
traits.name: unconvincing

traits.description: Timmy has been in plenty of fights since this pawn was a kid, and had built up a tolerance to injury and pain as a result.
traits.name: resilient

traits.description: Timmy lived a pampered life until now, and is unused to the brutal challenges present out in the Rim.
traits.name: fragile

traits.description: Timmy always tackle his tasks with great enthusism.
traits.name: energetic

traits.description: Timmy is slow. Sooo... slooow...
traits.name: sluggish

traits.description: Timmy always sleep like a baby.
traits.name: restful

traits.description: Timmy often has a difficult time falling asleep.
traits.name: restless

traits.description: Timmy is quite productive when it comes to work.
traits.name: efficient

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat of a bottleneck in the colony.
traits.name: inefficient

traits.description: Timmy is brave, this pawn would stand their where others would scramble and run.
traits.name: valiant

traits.description: When there's a fight, Timmy is the first to run.
traits.name: craven

traits.description: Timmy likes a good fight, this pawn will sometimes start a fight just because this pawn can.
traits.name: rowdy

traits.description: Timmy is usually calm and collected.
traits.name: composed

traits.description: Timmy is more comfortable being in hot environment than his peers.
traits.name: heattolerant

traits.description: Timmy does not like being in the heat.
traits.name: heatintolerant

traits.description: Timmy is more comfortable being in cold environment than his peers.
traits.name: coldtolerant

traits.description: Timmy does not like being in the cold.
traits.name: coldintolerant

traits.description: Timmy has a well built body, people around this pawn find that rather attractive.
traits.name: muscular

traits.description: Timmy looks a bit fragile, but not in a lovable way.
traits.name: frail

traits.description: Timmy doesn't eat or drink much.
traits.name: abstinent

traits.description: Timmy has a bottomless pit for a stomach.
traits.name: ravenous

traits.description: This is what a common trait would look like when paired with RimTraits: Vanilla Trait Colours.
traits.name: traitdemo:common

traits.description: This is what an uncommon trait would look like when paired with RimTraits: Vanilla Trait Colours.
traits.name: traitdemo:uncommon

traits.description: This is what a rare trait would look like when paired with RimTraits: Vanilla Trait Colours.
traits.name: traitdemo:rare

traits.description: This is what an epic trait would look like when paired with RimTraits: Vanilla Trait Colours.
traits.name: traitdemo:epic

traits.description: This is what a legendary trait would look like when paired with RimTraits: Vanilla Trait Colours.
traits.name: traitdemo:legendary

traits.description: Timmy is naturally talented, this pawn gets a headstart before everyone else.
traits.name: gifted

traits.description: Timmy is someone everyone loves to hate.
traits.name: incompetent

traits.description: Timmy takes great care in the preparation of food, this pawn never skip a step just to have an early meal.
traits.name: patientcook

traits.description: Timmy couldn't care less about following the recipes as long as this pawn can get food into their mouth in record time.
traits.name: impatientcook

traits.description: Timmy lives a healthy lifestyle, and wakes up feeling energetic and cheerful.
traits.name: healthy

traits.description: Timmy gets ill quite often, and seem to require more effort to get out of bed than the average person.
traits.name: chronicallyill

traits.description: Timmy is comfortable in all seasons.
traits.name: temperaturetolerant

traits.description: Timmy thinks that summer is way too hot, and winter is way too cold.
traits.name: temperatureintolerant

traits.description: Timmy has good reaction time and finds physical activities less stressful than their peers.
traits.name: coordinated

traits.description: Timmy is easily distracted and often mess up when it comes to physical activities.
traits.name: clumsy

traits.description: Timmy is what people refer to as a 'stronk boi'.
traits.name: hardy

traits.description: Timmy is so fragile, it doesn't take much to take them out of action.
traits.name: feeble

traits.description: Whether by sheer optimism or a force of personality, Timmy always manages to see the bright side of life.
traits.name: easilyamused

traits.description: Life to Timmy is an endless, boring joke that this pawn just can't get away from.
traits.name: constantlybemused

traits.description: Timmy has an interest in understanding the workings of the world, and is able to apply their knowledge in daily life.
traits.name: inquisitive

traits.description: Gaps in Timmy's education and general lack of curiosity makes life often stressful for them.
traits.name: ignorant

traits.description: Timmy doesn't take "No" as an answer.
traits.name: aggressivehandholder

traits.description: Prefers handholding with dead people.
traits.name: necrophiliac

traits.description: Timmy likes to walk on the wild side.
traits.name: zoophile

traits.description: Timmy loves handholding and always wants more. Can regain psyfocus only through handholding.
traits.name: hyperhandholder

traits.description: Timmy is absolutely gorgeous. Even at first glance, people fall in love with the sight of them. However, this overwhelming beauty may allow jealousy and envy to overcome them. Since they hate ruining their look, they can't take much of a beating before breaking down.
traits.name: gorgeous

traits.description: Timmy is absolutely hideous. their face resembles a melted blobfish which got crushed by a meat tenderizer. Most others would rather sniff cow dung within 5 centimeters of it than look at them. The harsh amount of hate they've received over the years has hardened their emotions, and made them tougher.
traits.name: hideous

traits.description: Timmy easily completes any task they are assigned to at an efficient rate but seems to learn skills a lot slower compared to others.
traits.name: hyperfocused

traits.description: Timmy has trouble completing any task they are assigned and will take significantly longer to do so, however, learns at a quicker rate than most others.
traits.name: lethargic

traits.description: Timmy is a speed demon. They move at an extremely fast pace and leaves everyone else in the dust.
traits.name: sprinter

traits.description: Timmy is a marksman, hitting most shots with ease. They rarely miss, but take quite an extended amount of time to aim their shots.
traits.name: deadeye

traits.description: Timmy is as trigger happy as it can get. Whilst they can fire at incredible rates, they don't seem to hit many of their shots.
traits.name: gun-ho

traits.description: Timmy is a natural ranged fighter. They love using ranged weaponry and are skilled in doing so. However, they will be unhappy if holding a melee weapon.
traits.name: archer

traits.description: Timmy adores explosions. They love handling bombs, molotovs, and similar explosives. However, if they are told to carry a different weapon, they will be very upset.
traits.name: demolitionsexpert

traits.description: Timmy has an unnatural ability to extract precious minerals from ores. They will dig up more yield from every ore but at a slower rate.
traits.name: skilledextractor

traits.description: Timmy knows where to mine to get the most ore. They will dig up more yield from every ore but at a slower rate.
traits.name: extractor

traits.description: Timmy is a speedy, albeit rough miner. They will break ores and stone quicker, but ore gets lost in the process.
traits.name: clumsyminer

traits.description: Timmy is very impatient when it comes to mining. They will break ores and stone much quicker, but more ore gets lost in the process.
traits.name: impatientminer

traits.description: Timmy is absolutely terrified of explosive weapons. If they are holding an explosive weapon, it will drive them mad with fright.
traits.name: ekrixiphobia

traits.description: Timmy is a natural plant worker. They know their way around gardens and farms alike. Taking their time, they can yield a lot more produce out of plants.
traits.name: greentouch

traits.description: While they have the right intentions, Timmy just isn't the great farmer they think they are. They speed through planting and harvesting much quicker than others, but leave behind a lot of produce.
traits.name: browntouch

traits.description: Timmy has everything together most of the time and uses that ability to work much faster.
traits.name: veryorganized

traits.description: Timmy is usually organized when it comes to working, and will work a little faster than others.
traits.name: organized

traits.description: Timmy loses focus and tools often which leads to their disorganization. They will take longer to finish their tasks.
traits.name: disorganized

traits.description: Timmy can barely keep their eyes on their task, and loses the tools for their work relatively often. This leads to a large decrease in productivity.
traits.name: verydisorganized

traits.description: Timmy knows how to prepare food properly, and has a significantly decreased chance of creating poisoned meals regardless of cooking area.
traits.name: naturalcook

traits.description: Timmy has a knack for cutting in the right areas. If they are assigned to butcher any creature, they will do it with precision.
traits.name: masterbutcher

traits.description: Timmy isn't a rookie to butchering meat and can save more flesh while butchering.
traits.name: butcher

traits.description: Timmy has very shaky hands, and can't butcher meat very easily without guidance.
traits.name: shakyhands

traits.description: Timmy can't butcher meat without messing something up, and wastes a lot of valuable flesh.
traits.name: imprecisebutcher

traits.description: Timmy is a grease monkey. It's almost as if they were born to handle metal and electronics with ease.
traits.name: greasemonkey

traits.description: Timmy isn't a newbie to disassembling robots. They are a natural at breaking down old junk.
traits.name: mechanic

traits.description: Timmy is very faulty when it comes to disassembling robots. They'll waste precious resources when butchering mechanoids.
traits.name: faultymechanic

traits.description: Timmy can't butcher mechanoids without messing something up, and wastes a lot of valuable resources.
traits.name: unskilledmechanic

traits.description: Timmy is very stealthy and has a much easier time keeping in the shadows while hunting.
traits.name: verystealthy

traits.description: Timmy is a stealthy individual, who can sneak around wildlife easier than others can.
traits.name: stealthy

traits.description: Timmy is a professional medic. They can patch wounds that would normally kill others at surprising rates.
traits.name: professionalmedic

traits.description: Timmy is a doctor. They'll fix up any scratches or bruises faster than normal.
traits.name: doctor

traits.description: Timmy has a hard time applying the right treatment to patients, and thus is slower at tending.
traits.name: unskilleddoctor

traits.description: Timmy can barely wrap a bandage around their own arm, let alone anyone elses.
traits.name: terriblemedic

traits.description: Timmy is a master surgeon. Bionics, replacement parts, organ transplants, whatever needs done will be done.
traits.name: mastersurgeon

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled surgeon. They'll do surgery jobs a lot quicker than others.
traits.name: skilledsurgeon

traits.description: Timmy has a hard time cutting into human flesh to replace or add parts, it almost makes them sick.
traits.name: unskilledsurgeon

traits.description: Timmy can barely pick up a scalpel to even start a surgery job, and has a hard time using the tools.
traits.name: terriblesurgeon

traits.description: Timmy has no more fucks to give.
traits.name: alloutoffucks

traits.description: Timmy is made for designing colonies on the rimworlds.
traits.name: astronomer

traits.description: Timmy is a little pushy, but with it comes natural authority.
traits.name: authoritarian

traits.description: Timmy loves being outdoors, exploring new things. And this pawn knows how to pack for whatever it takes them.
traits.name: backpacker

traits.description: Timmy loves sharp, bladed weapons and is deadly wielding them.
traits.name: blader

traits.description: Timmy loves all things growing. And this pawn has a very good hand with them.
traits.name: botanist

traits.description: Timmy always talks about their own accomplishments. It's pretty tiresome, but has its uses.
traits.name: braggart

traits.description: Timmy is almost over the edge. Dont push them.
traits.name: edgy

traits.description: Timmy is all about small talk.
traits.name: smalltalker

traits.description: Timmy practices 'better safe than sorry'.
traits.name: cautious

traits.description: Timmy is just a bucket of joy.
traits.name: cheerful

traits.description: Timmy has a sharp mind.
traits.name: clever

traits.description: Timmy is trained in speedy treatment.
traits.name: combatmedic

traits.description: Timmy is the kind of person who thinks everything is everbody else's fault.
traits.name: complainer

traits.description: Timmy's body just works a bit differently. this pawn eats a lot, but has a lot of energy an strength in return.
traits.name: livingbioreactor

traits.description: Timmy is the definition of 'head on'. Sometimes it's not to their benefit.
traits.name: daredevil

traits.description: Timmy has steady hands.
traits.name: steadyhands

traits.description: Timmy is determined and won't fold easily.
traits.name: determined

traits.description: Timmy is doomed.
traits.name: doomed

traits.description: Every new day equals new opportunities.Timmy is as eager to explore them all.
traits.name: earlyriser

traits.description: Timmy always finds a way to improve things.
traits.name: developer

traits.description: Timmy always takes a defensive stance when fighting. this pawn takes and deals less damage.
traits.name: defensivefighter

traits.description: Timmy has a pretty bad habit of closing their eyes when something's coming at them.
traits.name: flincher

traits.description: Timmy has great hands with all things growing.
traits.name: florist

traits.description: Timmy is everywhere all the time.
traits.name: freerunner

traits.description: Timmy is the sort of person who does their job and let everybody else worry about the rest.
traits.name: rolledupsleeves

traits.description: Timmy takes everyday routines seriously.
traits.name: healtyroutines

traits.description: Timmy loves crafting and shooting rifles and other bigger guns. And not much else.
traits.name: riflesmith

traits.description: Timmy is all about the stones.
traits.name: mason

traits.description: Timmy likes to fight. And this pawn's good at it.
traits.name: fighter

traits.description: Timmy does whatever it takes and not very often in the nicest of ways.
traits.name: ruthless

traits.description: Timmy is all about spreading the faith through words.
traits.name: devout

traits.description: Timmy is fighting in the name of their faith.
traits.name: zealot

traits.description: Timmy is huge. Strong, but slow in two different ways.
traits.name: behemoth

traits.description: Timmy is not interested in that. Nope, not that either.
traits.name: uncultured

traits.description: Timmy's body doesn't respond much to any kind of substances. For good or bad.
traits.name: substancetolerant

traits.description: Timmy believes summer is the best time of year.
traits.name: likessummer

traits.description: Timmy believes fall is the best time of year.
traits.name: likesfall

traits.description: Timmy believes winter is the best time of year.
traits.name: likeswinter

traits.description: Timmy believes spring is the best time of year.
traits.name: likesspring

traits.description: Timmy has long arms and legs. this pawn moves fast, but is a little frail and doesn't have perfect control of their limbs.
traits.name: spindly

traits.description: Timmy can make good looking stuff from pretty much anything.
traits.name: junkartist

traits.description: Timmy has a habit of hitting their enemies the right way.
traits.name: directhitter

traits.description: Timmy has a habit of hitting their enemies the wrong way.
traits.name: indirecthitter

traits.description: Timmy is doing all this pawn can to not piss someone off.
traits.name: exile

traits.description: Timmy is gonna be a wild child all their life.
traits.name: wildchild

traits.description: Timmy knows what this pawn wants and usually gets it.
traits.name: go-getter

traits.description: Timmy is simply sloppy.
traits.name: sloppy

traits.description: Timmy is a fearsome fighter with fists and blunt weapons.
traits.name: cagefighter

traits.description: Everything Timmy cooks turns into Dark matter.
traits.name: incompetentcook

races.description: A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
races.name: human

races.description:
A holographic projection operated by a mind located elsewhere. Despite its humanlike appearance, the avatar could belong to a machine persona with frighteningly alien goals.

If the projection is destroyed, its emitter will need a day to reestablish coherence, but the mind itself suffers no permanent harm.
races.name: hologram

races.description: An all-female race of humans spliced with fox genes. Originally, they were Glitterworld designermates from the planet Aolara, but an internal war forced them to leave their homeworld. Now they are spread among the rim.
races.name: Kurin

races.description: the Marvelous gift of glitterworld bionics. Humanoid with cat ears and tail.
races.name: Nyaron

races.description: A beautiful, semi-reptilian creature with features of a mythical dragon and a human being. They are prized by poachers for their silky, silver hair, and others seek to capture them for their high price at the black markets.
races.name: Dragonian

races.description: A beautiful, semi-reptilian creature with features of a mythical dragon and a human being. They are prized by poachers for their silky, silver hair, and others seek to capture them for their high price at the black markets.
races.name: Dragonian

races.description: Kijins are ogres who were evolved alikes of humans. Their huge bodies and muscles have shrunk, but the muscles are more dense and stronger. They still have to eat a lot to keep themselves up.
races.name: Kijin

races.description: Lapelli is Developed by advanced genetic engineering. They are strong, strong in strength and stamina, suitable for simple labor, and prefer close combat. They don't care whether they eat raw food or sleep in a cold place or sleep on the floor.
races.name: Lapelli
